name: Super Pop-N-Lock Ball: Extreme Dubstep Edition!
name_original: Super Pop-N-Lock Ball: Extreme Dubstep Edition!
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 2017.

A 2-player game where each player controls one arm of a hip-hop dancer showcasing his totally rad arm-wave skills. Your buttons activate each of the poses of an arm wave for your arm. Use this to waggle your arm to bounce the ball over your opponent's arm and into your goal to win!
This game was made in only the last 16 hours of the jam while also busy organizing the jam site!

Press the ENTER key or click the "Try Again!" button to restart for a rematch!
Player 1 presses the following keys: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and ~
Player 2 presses the following keys: 0, 9, 8, 7, 6, and -

Music derived from dubstep loops from Looperman
( http://www.looperman.com/ )
